amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the Defense Department from reimbursing defense contractors for costs associated with corporate mergers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as the Sanders amendment No. 20 in the Congressional Record of June 12, 1996, to prohibit the Pentagon from spending appropriated funds to reimburse defense contractors for costs associated with corporate mergers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (NJ) amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
